pkgmetadata.longdescription: Synthetic Population Generator // Generates high-entropy integer synthetic populations from marginal and (optionally) seed data using quasirandom sampling, in arbitrary dimensionality (Smith, Lovelace and Birkin (2017) doi:10.18564/jasss.3550). The package also provides an implementation of the Iterative Proportional Fitting (IPF) algorithm (Zaloznik (2011) doi:10.13140/2.1.2480.9923).
